alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Iberia; Lafayette; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 3:56PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, Lafayette, northwestern St. Mary, southeastern Acadia, northeastern Vermilion and northwestern St. Martin Parishes through 430 PM CST... At 355 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mire to near Kaplan. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Abbeville, Catahoula, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Rayne, Carencro, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Kaplan, Avery Island, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Duson, Henderson, Maurice and Loreauville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 87 and 119. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Iberia; Lafayette; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion
